Detailed Description

template<class T>
class ting::Singleton< T >

singleton base class.

This is a basic singleton template. Usage as follows: 

        class MySingleton : public ting::Singleton<MySingleton>{
        public:
                void DoSomething(){
                        //...
                }
  };

        int main(int, char**){
                MySingleton mySingleton;

                MySingleton::Inst().DoSomething();
        }

template<class T>
static bool ting::Singleton< T >::IsCreated (  )  [inline, static]

tells if singleton object is created or not.

Note, this function is not thread safe.

Returns:
true if object is created.
false otherwise.
